ConvIntelligenceSignalSubRule.name: ConvIntelligenceSignalSubRule
ConvIntelligenceSignalSubRule.description: Represents a condition (subrule) within a conversation intelligence signal rule.

ConvIntelligenceSignalRuleId.description: Unique ID of the conversation intelligence signal rule. This field is a relationship field.

OperandValue.description: Value of the signal type used to determine if the rule condition is met. For example, escalate_level_1.

Operator.description: Filter logic operator used to determine if the rule condition is met. Possible values are: Equals GreaterThan LessThan NotEquals

Order.description: Order the condition appears in relation to the other conditions in the list, with zero (0) being the first condition listed. If Type is set to Keyword, the maximum value is 24. For all other Type values, the maximum value is 4. This value is used when applying filter logic to the rule.

Type.description: Type of conversation intelligence signal used by the rule to determine whether to trigger an action. This value depends on the ConvIntelligenceSignalRule.ConversationChannelId and ConvIntelligenceSignalRule.Service values.

ConvIntelligenceSignalSubRule.accessRules: an add-on license for Service Cloud Voice for Amazon Connect, Service Cloud Voice for Partner Telephony with Amazon Connect, Service Cloud Voice for Partner Telephony, or Digital Engagement
